comments.body: doesn't this style of initializer on FieldAttribute cause the instance aliasing issue (eg, where all instances end up sharing the same empty list)?
nevermind- I see we added the isa check to deepcopy those for specific cases

comments.body: Why is this change needed for the addition of the var lookup? I don't understand the context, any chance we could add it to the comment?
vars let me discover we were doing something improper and allowing direct use of the lookup as a keyword, since 'vars' already exists ... it was getting overloaded, this fixes that bug.
